name: Astralith

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally ACC in the Arena by 90.

skills.name: Assault Leader
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Fills the Turn Meter of a random ally by 15%. Fills the Turn Meter by 30% if this attack is critical.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Heart Rot
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Places two [Bomb] debuffs that detonate after 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Judgement
skills.raw_description:
Exchanges remaining HP levels with a target enemy, then attacks with the default skill. Cannot be used on a boss.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1
